Title: Wake Up Call (2)
Plot: It's been one year since the 4400 returned.  After a period of intense medical observation, Tom has returned to NTAC in a limited capacity, assigned only to desk duty.  Diana, having been through a series of inept partners, finally finds a way to cut through the red tape and get Tom back, all while in the midst of formally adopting Maia.  Meanwhile, Richard, Lily and the baby are still living in meager conditions in a mountain cabin far away from Jordan.  Jordan has now closed Arcadia Estates, a
